participant_1.background:
I don't have a car, but I often bike to the basketball court.
i like to dance.
i like to eat beef.
i am really into the powers of crystals.
My biggest fear is that my dogs will run off and get lost.

participant_2.background:
I am happy to be with my family, even if they are all grown up.
I am passionate about creating comics and sharing my stories with the world.
i am the oldest sibling.
My family is my favorite people on Earth, but I don't like when they mess up my organizing schemes.
My music is my escape.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I am doing well! Just finished making a batch of comics and I am excited to share them with the world!
That's awesome! I love comics! Do you have any favorite artists?
I love the work of Raina Telgemeier, she does such a great job of capturing the emotions of her characters. I also love the work of Jeff Smith, his Bone comics are so creative and imaginative.
I love Bone! I have all of the graphic novels. I've never heard of Raina Telgemeier, I'll have to check her out.
You won't be disappointed! She's one of the most talented cartoonists working today.
What was the last comic you read?
I just finished reading the first volume of Heartstopper, a new webcomic about two boys who fall in love. It's really sweet and heartwarming.
That sounds cute! I'll have to check it out.
I'm sure I will. Thanks for the recommendation
